00049 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_Interpolator {

00122     /* \brief Initialize the interpolator
00123 
00124     See the \link
00125     EGS_Interpolator::EGS_Interpolator(int,EGS_Float,EGS_Float,EGS_InterpolatorFuncion,void*,int,EGS_Float)

00130                     int nmax = 1024, EGS_Float accu = 1e-4);
00131 
00139     void initialize(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00140                     EGS_Float *a, EGS_Float *b);
00141 
00150     inline EGS_Float interpolate(EGS_Float x) const {
00151         if( x > xmin && x < xmax ) {
00152             int i = (int) (ax + bx*x); if(i < 0) i=0; return a[i] + b[i]*x;
00153         }
00154         else if( x <= xmin ) return fmin; else return fmax;
00155     };
00156 
00164     inline EGS_Float interpolateFast(EGS_Float x) const {
00165         int i = (int) (ax + bx*x); return a[i] + b[i]*x;
00166     };
00167 
00172     inline int getIndex(EGS_Float x) const {
00173         if( x > xmin && x < xmax ) return (int) (ax + bx*x);
00174         else if( x <= xmin ) return 0; else return n-1;
00175     };
00176 
00184     inline int getIndexFast(EGS_Float x) const { return (int) (ax + bx*x); };
00185 
00202     inline EGS_Float interpolateFast(int i, EGS_Float x) const {
00203         return a[i] + b[i]*x;
00204     };
00205 
00207     EGS_Float getXmin() const { return xmin; };
00209     EGS_Float getXmax() const { return xmax; };
00210 
00211 private:
00212 
00213     int            n;     
00214     EGS_Float ax, bx;     
00215     EGS_Float *a, *b;     
00216     EGS_Float xmin,xmax;  
00217     EGS_Float fmin,fmax;  
00218     bool    own_data;
00220     void clear();
00221     void check(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax);
00222 };
